meanings.definition: A type of vitamin essential for the body's metabolism.
meanings.sent1: Thiamines are important for keeping our bodies healthy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend including thiamines in your diet for better health.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to take my thiamines today; I hope my body doesn't get mad!
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels skyrocketed after she started taking thiamines regularly.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the thiamines, making them sparkle like tiny gems.
